SEARCH
Package main.java.neat.visualizer

Class GenomeVisualizerBuilder

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.visualizer.GenomeVisualizerBuilder
public class GenomeVisualizerBuilder extends Object
Builder class for constructing configured GenomeVisualizer instances. Implements the fluent builder pattern to simplify visualization configuration.

Example usage: 

 GenomeVisualizer visualizer = new GenomeVisualizerBuilder()
     .setNodeSize(25)
     .setNodeShape(SHAPE.SQUARE)
     .build();
Author:
Taher Joudeh

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder()
    Constructs a new builder with default empty configuration.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    GenomeVisualizer
    build()
    Finalizes the configuration and constructs the GenomeVisualizer.
    GenomeVisualizerBuilder
    defaultGenomeVisuals()
    Applies a predefined set of default visualization parameters: Node Size: 20px. Shape: Circle. Input Nodes: Green (#0f9900). Hidden Nodes: Red (#db2100). Output Nodes: Cyan (#00afbf). Positive Connections: Dark Red (#960032). Negative Connections: Purple (#320096).

    • defaultGenomeVisuals

      public GenomeVisualizerBuilder defaultGenomeVisuals()
      Applies a predefined set of default visualization parameters:
      • Node Size: 20px.
      • Shape: Circle.
      • Input Nodes: Green (#0f9900).
      • Hidden Nodes: Red (#db2100).
      • Output Nodes: Cyan (#00afbf).
      • Positive Connections: Dark Red (#960032).
      • Negative Connections: Purple (#320096).
      Returns:
      This builder instance with default configuration.

    • build

      public GenomeVisualizer build()
      Finalizes the configuration and constructs the GenomeVisualizer.
      Returns:
      Fully configured GenomeVisualizer instance ready for use.
